item.title: 高盛调整多元化政策
item.description: 华尔街银行高盛（Goldman Sachs）周四表示，已根据美国法律的某些发展调整了其多元化举措。【原文：Goldman Sachs has tweaked its diversity initiatives in light of certain developments in the law in the U.S., the Wall Street bank said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国第四季度经济增长放缓
item.description: 美国政府周四证实，美国第四季度经济增长放缓，在寒冷的气温和关税将通过提高价格损害消费的担忧下，这种增长势头在本季度初似乎仍将持续。【原文：U.S. economic growth slowed in the fourth quarter, the government confirmed on Thursday, and the loss of momentum appears to have persisted early this quarter amid cold temperatures and concerns that tariffs will hurt spending through higher prices.】

item.title: 独家报道：因洗钱被美国处罚 30 亿美元后，道明银行任命合规监督员
item.description: 加拿大道明银行任命 Guidepost Solutions 为其反洗钱计划的合规监督机构，因为去年美国监管机构对该银行处以 30 亿美元的罚款。【原文：Canadian lender TD Bank appointed Guidepost Solutions as the compliance monitor for its anti-money laundering program after U.S. regulators hit the lender with $3 billion in penalties last year.】

item.title: 施密德：美国通胀预期上升意味着美联储必须保持警惕
item.description: 堪萨斯城联储主席杰夫-施密德（Jeff Schmid）周四表示，最近的调查显示消费者通胀预期上升，这意味着美国央行需要继续关注确保价格压力得到充分控制，这凸显了一个日益严重且可能给决策者带来困扰的问题。【原文：Recent surveys showing a rise in consumer inflation expectations mean the U.S. central bank needs to keep its focus on ensuring price pressures are fully contained, Kansas City Federal Reserve President Jeff Schmid said on Thursday, highlighting a growing and potentially troubling issue for policymakers.】

item.title: 消息人士称，苹果可能因隐私工具面临法国反垄断罚款
item.description: 两位直接了解此事的人士称，由于法国监管机构准备在下个月对苹果公司的隐私控制工具做出裁决，苹果公司可能面临反垄断罚款。【原文：Apple is facing a likely antitrust fine as the French regulator prepares to rule next month on the company's privacy control tool, two people with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美国 1 月份核心资本货物订单超出预期
item.description: 1 月份美国主要资本货物制造业的新订单激增，暗示第一季度企业设备支出将出现反弹。【原文：New orders for key U.S.-manufactured capital goods surged in January, hinting at a rebound in business spending on equipment in the first quarter.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数增幅超过预期
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数增幅超过预期，但这可能并不意味着劳动力市场状况发生了实质性变化。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits increased more than expected last week, but that likely does not signal a material shift in labor market conditions.】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，Sycamore 计划在收购沃尔格林后对其进行三方分拆
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，Sycamore Partners 计划在将沃尔格林连锁药店私有化后，将其三大业务拆分为具有不同资本结构的独立单元。【原文：Sycamore Partners plans to split Walgreens' three main businesses into separate units with distinct capital structures after taking the pharmacy chain private, the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，Stripe 在最新要约收购中估值 915 亿美元
item.description: 据 CNBC 周四报道，金融科技公司 Stripe 宣布向员工和股东发出要约收购，公司估值 915 亿美元。【原文：Fintech firm Stripe announced a tender offer for employees and shareholders valuing the company at $91.5 billion, CNBC reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 瑞士银行规则延迟对瑞银来说喜忧参半
item.description: 针对瑞银的更严格的新资本规则可能会推迟实施，这增加了瑞士银行前景的不确定性，但同时也暂停了潜在的繁重负担，因为特朗普白宫放松管制的举措使美国商业竞争对手处于不利地位。【原文：A likely delay in tougher new capital rules for UBS has fed uncertainty about the outlook for the Swiss bank but also paused potentially onerous burdens as the Trump White House's drive to deregulate puts U.S. business rivals on the back foot.】

item.title: 人工智能货币化成焦点，Salesforce 因年度业绩预期疲软而下跌
item.description: 周四收盘前，Salesforce 股价下跌超过 3%，此前该公司下调了年度营收和利润预期，让人怀疑这家企业云计算公司何时才能开始从人工智能的巨额押注中获得有意义的回报。【原文：Shares of Salesforce fell over 3% before the bell on Thursday after a downbeat annual revenue and profit forecast raised questions about when the enterprise cloud firm would start to show meaningful returns on its hefty artificial intelligence bets.】

item.title: 小米豪华电动轿车售价 72,932 美元
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商小米公司周四将其豪华电动轿车SU7 Ultra定价为529900元人民币（合72931.72美元）。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Xiaomi on Thursday priced its luxury electric sedan, the SU7 Ultra, at 529,900 yuan ($72,931.72).】

item.title: 诺维信缩减 COVID 疫苗支出，季度亏损减少
item.description: 本周四，Novavax 公司第四季度亏损收窄，原因是其唯一上市产品 COVID-19 疫苗的销售和管理费用减少。【原文：Novavax's fourth-quarter loss narrowed on Thursday, helped by reduced selling and administrative expenses of COVID-19 vaccines, its only product on the market.】

item.title: 巴黎检察官就刚果矿产问题对苹果公司结案 - 文件
item.description: 根据路透社周四看到的一份文件，巴黎检察院已经了结了刚果民主共和国指控苹果公司在法国的子公司在供应链中使用冲突矿产的案件。【原文：The Paris prosecutor's office has closed a case filed by Democratic Republic of Congo accusing Apple subsidiaries in France of using conflict minerals in its supply chain, according to a document seen by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 策略师称全球股市将继续上涨，不会受贸易摩擦影响
item.description: 路透社最新季度民意调查显示，股市策略师们对全球股市的表现持积极看法，即使是最低迷的印度和日本股市指数也有望实现稳健上涨。【原文：Stock market strategists are sticking to their positive view on the performance of global equity markets, expecting solid gains in even the most beaten-down indexes in India and Japan, according to the latest quarterly Reuters polls.】

item.title: 日本出光兴产将建硫化锂工厂助力丰田电动车计划
item.description: 日本第二大炼油商出光兴产（Idemitsu Kosan 5019.T）周四表示，该公司计划在东京附近的千叶炼油厂建造一座大型硫化锂工厂，硫化锂是全固态电池的一种关键材料。【原文：Japan's No.2 oil refiner, Idemitsu Kosan 5019.T plans to build a large-scale plant for lithium sulphide, a key material for all-solid-state batteries, at its Chiba refinery, near Tokyo, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 霍梅尔食品公司因投入成本增加而季度利润不及预期
item.description: Skippy 花生酱生产商荷美尔食品公司（Hormel Foods）周四公布的第一季度利润未达预期，原因是投入成本上升，以及其 Planters 品牌分销设施去年出现的供应问题的持续影响。【原文：Skippy peanut butter maker Hormel Foods on Thursday missed first-quarter profit estimates, hurt by higher input costs and the persistent effects of a supply issue at its Planters brand's distribution facility from last year.】

item.title: 尽管增长放缓，Ocado 对长期推出 Kroger 网点持乐观态度
item.description: 英国网上超市和技术集团 Ocado 的老板表示，尽管其在美国的杂货合作伙伴克罗格公司（Kroger）在推出自动化仓库方面有所放缓，但 Ocado 仍对其最终开设 "大量 "自动化仓库充满信心。【原文：Ocado , the British online supermarket and technology group, is confident its U.S. grocery partner Kroger will eventually open "a significant number" of automated warehouses despite a slowdown in the roll-out of sites, Ocado's boss said.】

item.title: Meta 修复了导致 Instagram 卷轴充斥暴力视频的错误
item.description: Meta Platforms 周四表示，它已经解决了一个错误，该错误导致全球 Instagram 用户的个人 Reels feed 频道充斥着暴力和图片视频。【原文：Meta Platforms said on Thursday it had resolved an error that flooded the personal Reels feeds of Instagram users with violent and graphic videos worldwide.】

item.title: Bath & Body Works 预测年度业绩因关税和消费担忧而不温不火
item.description: Bath & Body Works 周四预测全年销售额和利润低于预期，为美国对中国进口商品征收关税的影响以及消费者对其香水和香味蜡烛的消费疲软做准备。【原文：Bath & Body Works forecast annual sales and profit below expectations on Thursday, bracing for the impact of U.S. tariffs on Chinese imports as well as weak consumer spending on its fragrances and scented candles.】

item.title: 贸易战升级，经济学家押注中国的韧性
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税议程中，中国居于首位，国内经济学家预计，随着贸易战的加剧，政策措施、供应链调整和全球合作伙伴关系的加强将对世界第二大经济体起到缓冲作用。【原文：With China at the forefront of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff agenda, domestic economists expect a combination of policy measures, supply chain adjustments and strengthened global partnerships to cushion the world's second-largest economy as the trade war intensifies.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现公司预计到 2026 年流媒体部门的订户将达到 1.5 亿
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros Discovery）周四表示，其流媒体服务到 2026 年将至少拥有 1.5 亿用户，此前 Max 的全球扩张推动了第四季度用户数量的增长，增幅超过预期。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery said on Thursday its streaming service will have at least 150 million users by 2026, after Max's global expansion powered stronger-than-expected subscriber gains in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 小米推出 15 Ultra 旗舰智能手机，售价 894 美元起
item.description: 全球第三大智能手机制造商小米公司周四发布了新款旗舰智能手机小米15 Ultra，基本型号起价6499元（894.19美元）。【原文：Xiaomi, the world's third-largest smartphone maker, launched its new flagship smartphone Xiaomi 15 Ultra on Thursday, with the base model starting at 6,499 yuan ($894.19).】

item.title: 加拿大道明银行受美国业务冲击，季度利润下降
item.description: 加拿大道明银行（TD Bank）周四公布第一季度利润下降，原因是其美国业务正在努力应对洗钱合规失败带来的影响。【原文：Canada's TD Bank reported a fall in first-quarter profit on Thursday as its U.S. business grapples with the fallout of money laundering compliance failures.】

item.title: 英伟达业绩缓解人工智能需求担忧，纳斯达克期货领涨
item.description: 美国股指期货周四上涨，原因是人工智能风向标英伟达（Nvidia）的乐观预测缓解了业界对需求降温的担忧，同时投资者也在评估特朗普政府最新威胁对全球贸易的影响。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Thursday as AI bellwether Nvidia's upbeat forecast soothed concerns of cooling demand in the industry, while investors gauged the implications of the Trump administration's latest threats on global trade.】

item.title: 渣打银行制定了详细的零净过渡计划
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered）周四披露了一项详细计划，概述了其将气候因素纳入业务运营的情况，目标是到 2050 年实现融资活动净零目标，到 2025 年实现业务运营净零目标。【原文：Standard Chartered on Thursday disclosed a detailed plan outlining its integration of climate considerations into its business operations, aiming for net zero targets across its financing activities by 2050 and its operations by 2025.】

item.title: 加拿大 RBC 季度利润增长，财富管理业务保持稳健
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行（Royal Bank of Canada）周四公布了第一季度利润增长报告，财富管理部门的强劲业绩为其带来了帮助。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada on Thursday reported a higher first-quarter profit, helped by strong performance in its wealth management unit.】

item.title: 早间竞价连英伟达都不看好，关税战迫在眉睫
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 亚马逊推出量子芯片，旨在缩短开发时间
item.description: 亚马逊网络服务公司（Amazon Web Services）周四展示了一款采用新技术的量子计算芯片，该公司希望通过这项新技术，将其制造商业上有用的量子计算机的努力缩短多达五年时间。【原文：Amazon Web Services on Thursday showed a quantum computing chip with new technology that it hopes will shave as much as five years off its effort to build a commercially useful quantum computer.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行因资本市场强劲而实现季度利润增长
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）周四公布第一季度利润增长，主要得益于其资本市场部门的强劲表现。【原文：Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce reported a rise in first-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by strength in its capital markets unit.】
